scripts.deploy:dev: SLS_DEBUG=* ../node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless deploy -s dev -r us-east-1 --verbose --cloudfront=true && echo 'Running client deploy...' && SLS_DEBUG=* ../node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless client deploy -s dev -r us-east-1 --cloudfront=true --no-confirm --no-policy-change --no-config-change && echo 'Invalidating cloudfront cache...' && SLS_DEBUG=* ../node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless cloudfrontInvalidate -s dev -r us-east-1 --cloudfront=true
scripts.deploy:staging: SLS_DEBUG=* ../node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless deploy -s staging -r us-east-1 --verbose --cloudfront=true && echo 'Running client deploy...' && SLS_DEBUG=* ../node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless client deploy -s staging -r us-east-1 --cloudfront=true --no-confirm --no-policy-change --no-config-change && echo 'Invalidating cloudfront cache...' && SLS_DEBUG=* ../node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless cloudfrontInvalidate -s staging -r us-east-1 --cloudfront=true
scripts.deploy:prod: SLS_DEBUG=* ../node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless deploy -s prod -r us-east-1 --verbose --cloudfront=true && echo 'Running client deploy...' && SLS_DEBUG=* ../node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless client deploy -s prod -r us-east-1 --cloudfront=true --no-confirm --no-policy-change --no-config-change && echo 'Invalidating cloudfront cache...' && SLS_DEBUG=* ../node_modules/serverless/bin/serverless cloudfrontInvalidate -s prod -r us-east-1 --cloudfront=true
